titles.title: Back to Basics Job Creation Act of 2015
To amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide grants to support job creation initiatives, and for other purposes.
Back to Basics Job Creation Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary:
Back to Basics Job Creation Act of 2015
This bill amends title XX (Block Grants to State for Social Services) of the Social Security Act to require the Department of Health and Human Services to make grants to eligible entities to assist low-income individuals and individuals who have been unemployed for at least three months in developing self-employment opportunities.
